disconnect() - Method in class com.etiennecollin.tp2.clientFx.ClientController
Disconnects the client from the server by sending a DISCONNECT_COMMAND to the server through the objectOutputStream.

Disconnects the client from the server by sending a DISCONNECT_COMMAND to the server through the objectOutputStream.
disconnect() - Method in class com.etiennecollin.tp2.server.ClientHandler
Sends a disconnection confirmation to the client, then closes the input/output streams and the client socket.

The command used to disconnect from a client.
